name: Al Moudira Hotel

name: Sofitel Winter Palace Luxor
description: {'Why choose Sofitel Winter Palace Luxor?': ['It was built in 1886 in the Victorian style, and is considered one of the finest hotel landmarks in Egypt.', "The hotel witnessed archaeologist Howard Carter's announcement of the discovery of Tutankhamun's tomb on the main terrace.", 'It combines old world elegance with the charm of the Nile River.'], 'Facilities and services': ['The hotel offers luxurious suites and rooms, along with lush gardens, a swimming pool, and upscale bars and restaurants.', 'The hotel is an ideal place to discover the sights of ancient Egypt thanks to its quiet and privileged location.', 'It offers a picturesque setting with a stunning view of the pool surrounded by palm trees, creating an oasis of calm.'], 'Hotel location': ['It is located on the banks of the Nile River in Luxor, close to the most important archaeological and historical landmarks such as Luxor Temple and Luxor Museum.']}
short_description: The hotel has an old-world charm, blending the elegance of the French Regency era with the charm of the Nile River.
